wikipedia_page.main: John Hogg (25 August 1879–unknown) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Middlesbrough.

response: John Hogg (born 1949) is an Australian politician.
John Hogg may also refer to:
*John Hogg, English Catholic martyr, see Richard Hill, Richard Holiday and John Hogg
*John Hogg, vocalist for the rock bands Moke and The Magpie Salute
